        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        JSONObject containing name,password, and ID used to set user.cookie
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions

        Post-Conditions

      • createGame

        public org.json.JSONObject createGame(java.lang.String name,
                             boolean randomTiles,
                             boolean randomNumbers,
                             boolean randomPorts)
        Parameters:
        name -
        randomTiles -
        randomNumbers -
        randomPorts -
        Returns:
        a JSONObject containing all of the information for the game board including game name, game id and an array for four empty player objects.
        Pre-Conditions
        name is not null, has values for randomTiles, randomNumbers, and randomPorts.
        Post-Conditions
        receive a HTTP response for success or failure
